column2: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy Prelude (2014) #1
column6: GET READY FOR MARVEL'S GUARDIANS OF THE GALAXY WITH AN ALL-NEW COMIC BOOK PRELUDE-WRITTEN BY COSMIC LEGENDS DAN ABNETT AND ANDY LANNING! - Who is Nebula? What tragic events forged her unbreakable allegiance to her dark lord? Find out here! - Plus: Gamora! Korath! And more from the Marvel Cinematic Universe!
column8: | writer:Dan Abnett | writer:Andy Lanning | artist:Wellington Alves
